name: Robot dash (monsterbitgame)
description:
Robot dash: Slider rush puzzle - is a casual maze escape game with hundreds (105) levels waiting for you. In this game, you just need to swipe and control your character, find the only way and get out of the maze, collecting gears on the way.

Features:

💠The game is completely free

💠5 different worlds

💠Easy control with one swipe in the right direction, which a player of any age can handle

💠Calm relaxing gameplay

💠Over 100+ unique levels of varying difficulty, test your puzzle skill

💠Global Leaderboards

💠World Achievement Lists

💠Nice graphics

💠Pleasant musical accompaniment
